column1: '''The Earliest Annals of Valinor''' is the sixth chapter of ''[[The Shaping of Middle-earth]]''.
This chapter details the events occurring in Valinor from The creation of all thing to approximately year 3000 of the Valar
column2: or roughly 30000 years of the sun. It details the creation of the world
column5: his release and the death of the trees
column6: the March of the Noldor begins
column7: and the section ends with the arrival of Fingolfin's forces in Middle-earth and the Rising of the sun.
